proyecto1.title: Radio App
proyecto1.description: It is an app where you can listen to the live broadcast of the Radio and follow the live broadcast they do on Youtube.
features: Listen to the live broadcast of the Radio
View streams from YouTube in the app
Notify when a Stream starts on YouTube so that they can join the broadcast
technologies: React Native: for creating the graphical interface
Expo-av: for playing the audio (radio broadcast)
YouTube API: for extracting live streams and videos from YouTube
YouTube API Player: for playing videos within the app

proyecto2.title: Social Network API
proyecto2.description: A personal project that aims to replicate and improve essential functionalities of a social network like Twitter

User Management: User registration with encrypted passwords using Spring Security and JWT
Secure authentication with token validation to protect user data.
Content Creation: Comment on posts to encourage interaction.
Personalized Posts: Users can see relevant posts based on their location.

Backend: Java: Main language for the API
Spring Boot: Framework for rapid and efficient backend development.
Spring Security + JWT: Password encryption and token management for authentication and authorization.
Database: PostgreSQL: Relational database for structured information storage.
Frontend: React: Currently working on the graphical interface for a modern and intuitive user experience.

proyecto3.title: Agricultural Farm Manager
proyecto3.description: It is an application for managing a farm. The application allows administrators to manage activities, resources, and records related to daily operations.
features: Role Manager: Depending on the user's roles, it provides different functionalities within the page
Manage products: Based on the products sold and harvested, an inventory is created to know how much is available
Employee Manager: Farm managers can see how much to pay each employee
technologies: PHP: for the backend and creating endpoints
React: For creating the graphical interface

proyecto4.title: Hotel Manager
proyecto4.description: It is a desktop application for hotel management where you can book rooms or view hotel statistics.
features: Create records for new clients so they can make reservations
View hotel statistics such as the number of reservations this month, etc.
